name: Feather Feet
description:
=== Feather Feet ===
"There is a sufficiency in the world for man's need but not for man's greed."
- Mahatma Gandhi

Feather Feet is greedy. So greedy that he is willing to risk his life to collect shiny little gold coins. Your job is to make sure Feather Feet stays alive. So he can live out his worthless little greedy life. The longer he lives the high score you will have. Good luck!

==== How to Play ====
- tilt side to side to move your character
- collect the coins that fall from the barrels
- try not to let the barrels fall on your head
- the longer you survive the higher your score
- collecting coins also give
